title: Provides for distribution of health care proxy information in mailings related to license and vehicle registration mailings to residents
summary: Provides for distribution of health care proxy information in mailings related to license and vehicle registration mailings to residents for a whole year, every four years, beginning not later than January 1, 2013.

memo:
BILL NUMBER:S2613

TITLE OF BILL:
An act
to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to distribution of
health care proxy information

PURPOSE OR GENERAL IDEA OF BILL:
To promote use of health care proxies by distributing information
through Department of Motor Vehicles mailings.

SUMMARY OF SPECIFIC PROVISIONS:
The Vehicle and Traffic Law is amended by adding a new section 397-c
to require the Department of Motor Vehicles to include health care
proxy forms and instructions developed by the Department of Health to
residents in mailings on drivers' licenses and periodically in
mailings on registrations.

JUSTIFICATION:
People want to and should have their health care wishes honored. Yet a
large majority of New York residents do not have a health care proxy.
As a result, their health care wishes are usually unknown and people
are given medical treatment that they would not want or not given
treatment that they would want.

Therefore, it is important for the state of New York to establish a
variety of ways to provide individuals with health care proxy forms
and instructions to increase the number of people who complete this
important document. It makes sense to have the Department of Motor
Vehicles, which periodically sends mailings to millions of residents
of the state, to include a health care proxy form and instructions.
This is consistent with what the Department does now when it provides
a place on driver's licenses for organ donations.

The first mailing would commence no later than the first of January
2013 and continue once every four years after that.

PRIOR LEGISLATIVE HISTORY:
This bill was previously introduced.

FISCAL IMPLICATIONS:
Nominal.

EFFECTIVE DATE:
Immediately.
